bibl.title: A Note on the Provenances of Some Greek Literary Papyri.
bibl.note: A discussion of "aberrant" toponyms which were referred to in Pack2 as the provenance of Greek and Latin literary papyri (Contrapollinopolis, Gizeh, Kainepolis, Koptos, Krokodilopolis, Aboutig). - Pp. 208-218: Appendix. A Survey of Greek and Latin Literary Papyri from Non-Fayumic Places in Egypt.
WORP Klaas A., A Note on the Provenances of Some Greek Literary Papyri.
